HOW CAN WE HELP?
Please reach out with any questions or concerns. We’re here to help.
Please use the form to help us best serve you. Thank you!

FREQUENTLY ASKED QUESTIONS
“Oak & Stone is a neighborhood-style beer and pizza joint with a modern twist geared towards great beer and gourmet tavern fare. All of our associates are ready and willing to answer any questions you may have about our services, food, and brews, but this section will get you started on understanding what we do. If your question isn’t answered here, please reach out to us by phone or on the internet to get all the info.”
Hidden element
What is the beer wall all about?
The beer wall allows you to be your own bartender. Each tap has its own screen that gives you information about what beer is on tap, it’s A.B.V (alcohol by volume), IBUs (a measure of how bitter the beer is), price, and some tasting notes. Using an RFID bracelet, you can open the tap and pour as much or as little as you would like, allowing you to sample to your hearts content.
How to get a bracelet for the beer wall?
Once you let an Oak and Stone associate know that you would like to enjoy the beer wall, you will provide an ID and Credit card on file in exchange for your own RFID bracelet. You are then free to pour.
How to use a bracelet for the beer wall?
Open the tap by waving your bracelet in front of the Oak and Stone logo until the light turns green.
How am I charged for the beer wall?
Our system measures your pours to the 1/10 of an ounce and charges accordingly, depending on your choice of brew. Once you are ready to settle up, you can get an itemized receipt of what you tasted.
Pizza ovens
Our stone pizza ovens are custom built for each Oak & Stone, giving our pizzas their unique flavor.
Dough
Our dough is made fresh in house, daily.
Do you offer Gluten Free and vegetarian options?
Yes, from handcrafted salads with fresh ingredients to our Gluten free crust and variety of build-your-own toppings, we have you covered.
Make my own
In addition to our Chef inspired signature pizzas, you can choose your dough, your sauce, and your toppings from our variety of house made ingredients.
Do you offer lunch specials?
Our Yin & Yang lunch special is the best workday value around. Monday through Friday get a daily pie, salad, and a soft drink for $11.
Do you only serve beer?
We have a full liquor bar as well as a great selection of your favorite wines by the glass.
Do you take reservations?
We do not offer reservations.
Where are you located?
Please view our five locations
here
.
Contact Information
Call us at (941) 225-4590 or visit our
Facebook
page.
